q: Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers and Michael Vick or as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. "I'm always trying to get better," he said. I'm trying to make better decisions, smarter decisions. I try not to put us in a bad situation. This season, 15 of his 34 rushes produced first downs, a rate of 44 percent that was best in the league among quarterbacks who ran more than five times. The Huddle:

Eric Schmidt has a great track record and has really steered Google Inc. to great success, said Gartner analyst Ray Valdes.
